name: SHR GenericAnswersVS ValueSet
title: SHR GenericAnswersVS ValueSet
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative

concept.display: The source responded that he or she did not know the information needed or requested.
The source asserts that the thing in question exists, but additional information is unknown. For example, Jim knows he has a dentist, but not recall her name.
Nothing of a type of thing is known to exists, e.g., the siblings of an only child. Also use this code to represent a 'none of the above' answer
